channel.title: What do the Two Sets of Header pins Connect to?
channel.description:
On my Axoloti there is a set of five header pins to the rear of the headphone jack and also there is a row of seven pins behind the leds and little buttons.
I don't see any thing about these connections

item.title: What do the Two Sets of Header pins Connect to?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Yes they're not documented (except in the schematic).

They're provisions for Axoloti Control (X3), and audio clock synchronization (X4). Audio clock synchronization is required to create a digital audio link between multiple Axoloti Core boards. But so far this has not been implemented.

Read full topic
item.source: What do the Two Sets of Header pins Connect to?
